column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Thursday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from March 31 to May 5, 2003.      The minutes are attached.Attachment (88 KB PDF)2003 Monetary policyHome |News and eventsAccessibility Last update: July 3, 2003
